scripts.build: tsc -p . && cp package.json build/create-auth-challange && cp package.json build/define-auth-challange && cp package.json build/pre-signup && cp package.json build/verify-auth-challange && cp package.json build/post-confirmation
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam build -t authentication-dev.yaml && sam package --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket rcp-dev && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name AuthenticationC
